Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: He's beyond the healer's skills. All l can do is ease his path.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: There is a spell. Some would say death is cleaner.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: lt's not a matter of gold. This is blood magic. Only death pays for life.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: No, not your death, Khaleesi. Bring me his horse.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: You must go also, lady. Once l begin to sing, no one must enter the tent. The dead will dance here tonight.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: Monstrous, twisted. l pulled him out myself. He was scaled like a lizard, blind, with leather wings like the wings of a bat. When l touched him the skin fell from his bones. Inside he was full of graveworms. l warned you that only death can pay for life. You knew the price.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: As you command, lady. Come. l will take you to him.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: He lives. You asked for life, you paid for life.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: When the sun rises in the west, sets in the east. When the seas go dry. When the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: lt was wrong of them to burn my temple. lt angered the Great Shepherd.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: lnnocent? He would have been The Stallion Who Mounts The World. Now he will burn no cities. Now his khalasar will trample no nations into dust.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: Saved me? Three of those riders had already raped me before you saved me, girl. l saw my godo s house burn, there where l had healed men and women beyond counting. ln the streets l saw piles of heads, the head of the baker who makes my bread, the head of a young boy that l had cured of fever just three moons past. So tell me again exactly what it was that you saved?

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: Why don't you take a look at your khal. Then you will see exactly what life is worth when all the rest has gone.

Name: mirri maz duur
Sentence: You will not hear me scream.
